channel.title: Jetty on Slices of a hacker's mind
channel.description: Recent content in Jetty on Slices of a hacker's mind

item.title: MySQL to Postgresql
item.description: I dislike MySQL. I never did like it, since Oracle bought Sun it starting to become more then just disliking it. I prefer to work with Postgresql. I want to migrate some of my MySQL DB to Postgresql.

item.title: [Gentoo]Jetty with a .WAR file
item.description: Jetty with a .WAR file In my company i currenly have a lot to do with Scala Lift.
